name: Development
description: Degree to which secure development practices and environments are implemented.

values.name: Formal Verification
values.description: Secure development environment with formal verification of code, strict access controls, and continuous monitoring for security threats.

values.name: SDL Practices
values.description: Secure development lifecycle (SDL) practices followed, including code reviews, static analysis, and vulnerability scanning, with access controls on development resources.

values.name: Basic Security Measures
values.description: Basic security measures in the development environment, some secure coding guidelines, but no formal SDL.

values.name: Insecure Environment
values.description: Insecure development environment, no secure coding practices, no access controls on development resources.
